buildCommand: timeout 300 bash -c 'export NEXT_PUBLIC_ANALYTICS_PATH=$(openssl rand -hex 4) && if [ -z "$VERCEL_GIT_PREVIOUS_SHA" ] || git diff --name-only $VERCEL_GIT_PREVIOUS_SHA $VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_SHA | grep -q "^packages/database/convex/"; then cd ../../packages/database && npx convex deploy --cmd-url-env-var-name NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL && cd ../../apps/main-site; fi && bun run build'
